channel.title: Interleaved RSS Feed
channel.description: This is an interleaved feed of the most recent entries from each RSS source, skipping any feeds with errors.

item.title: Four Critical Reactions to the Trump Verdict
item.description: As our long-time readers know, we’re not the biggest fans of Twitter/X “hot takes” following major events. Most of them are dumb, obvious, or both. But following the guilty verdict handed down against President Donald J Trump, conservatives on Twitter/X were surprisingly wise. Well, some of them were. Four reactions in particular caught our attention […] The post Four Critical Reactions to the Trump Verdict appeared first on 🔔 The Liberty Daily .

item.title: 'Very pleased': Trump's guilty verdict ignites mixed reactions outside NYC courtroom
item.description: Fox News Digital interviewed several people outside a New York City courtroom moments after former President Trump was found guilty on all charges against him.

item.title: “I Say This With Regret”: Bill Kristol and James Carville Praise “Remarkable” Trump Campaign
item.description: (DCNF)—“Never-Trump” conservative Bill Kristol and Democratic strategist James Carville reluctantly praised former President Donald Trump’s 2024 campaign in an interview published on Thursday. The Trump campaign passed President Joe Biden’s campaign in monthly fundraising for the first time in April as it raised $76 million in conjunction with the Republican National Committee, and the former […] The post “I Say This With Regret”: Bill Kristol and James Carville Praise “Remarkable” Trump Campaign appeared first on 🔔 The Liberty Daily .

item.title: 2024 Showdown: Trump and Biden quickly cash in on former president's guilty verdicts
item.description: The campaigns of President Biden and former President Trump quickly cashed in on the guilty verdicts in Trump's criminal trial for their 2024 election rematch.

item.title: Guilty Verdict Has “Guaranteed” Trump Victory in November, Warns Conservative “Hardball” Expert
item.description: (WND)—A verdict from a jury in far-left Manhattan has opined that President Donald Trump is guilty of 34 counts of misreporting business costs, one of the Democrats’ lawfare cases they have launched against the GOP candidate for president this year. It’s going to cost them, one expert suggests. “Today’s verdict from this partisan, corrupt, and […] The post Guilty Verdict Has “Guaranteed” Trump Victory in November, Warns Conservative “Hardball” Expert appeared first on 🔔 The Liberty Daily .

item.title: Justice Breyer Says SCOTUS Majority Doing It All Wrong
item.description: The question of how judges analyze the Constitution and statutes is perhaps the most pressing legal issue of our time.

item.title: 'Salute me or shoot me': Venezuelan gang members sneaking into US pose 'serious threat'
item.description: A number of illegal immigrants affiliated with the Venezuelan gang Tren de Aragua were nabbed in Texas this week, according to the top U.S. border official.

item.title: Trump Found Guilty in NY Hush Money Trial
First on Fox: Calls for State Department to abandon 'obsession' with DEI and 'depoliticize,' new report says
item.description: The Heritage Foundation urged the State Department to dismantle it's Office of Diversity and Inclusion and to prioritize standardized testing as a means of determining qualified candidates.

item.title: Republican Senate Candidate Larry Hogan Just Ended His Political Career With One Tweet
item.description: The post Republican Senate Candidate Larry Hogan Just Ended His Political Career With One Tweet appeared first on 🔔 The Liberty Daily .

item.title: Trying To Buy a House Is 'Playing a Game You Can't Win'
item.description: The US housing market has changed dramatically since the pandemic - an issue looming over the election.

item.title: Trump campaign warns Biden to 'buckle up' after he's released from 'freezing' court to hit campaign trail
item.description: Former President Trump is thrilled to be out of a “freezing" New York City courtroom after a six-week trial and is ready to hit the campaign trail.
